scripts.dev: bun --watch build.mjs & bunx tailwindcss -i src/styles.css -o dist/styles.css --watch & bun build src/main.js --outdir dist --watch & bunx live-server dist
scripts.build: bunx tailwindcss -i src/styles.css -o dist/styles.css && bun build src/main.js --outdir dist --minify && bun run build.mjs
